Figure 2.An overview ofLettinGo, which consists of three stages. It begins withProfile Exploration, where diverse user profiles are generated from existing LLMs. These profiles are then utilized in downstream recommendation systems forTask-Driven Evaluation. Finally, the evaluated profiles are constructed as pairwise preference data to train the profile generator inProfile Preference Alignment.
